entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Cape George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Snow or periods of ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
